name: AffirmationOnDemand
0:
”Alexa open Affirmation on demand”
”Affirmation Please”
”Daily Affirmation”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: affirmation on demand
des:
Alexa can now help you feel good about yourself everyday, just ask her for an affirmation. Alexa will then send you an affirmation randomly selected to say to yourself or listen to her tell you an affirmation. Our database is expanding with new affirmations being added weekly.


This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
